long_description: Decked out with warm insulation, handy pockets and subtle style, the waterproof 686 Mannual Legacy insulated jacket makes your day on the slopes carefree and loads of fun. INFIDRY-10(TM) breathable waterproof coating complements 80g polyester insulation in the body to deliver premium weather protection and warmth in the winter. Hood and sleeves have 40g insulation for a balance of warmth and good range of movement. Fully taped seams ensure water doesn't make its way inside. Hood features a laminated brim to keep snow out of your eyes; single-pull drawcord lets you easily adjust the hood. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. Zippered hand pockets and a left-chest cargo pocket with flip-up season pass holder keep all your essentials close at hand. Vent zipper on the right chest lets you access interior lining pockets. 686 Mannual Legacy insulated jacket is rated to keep you warm from about 0degF to 32degF. Snowboarding and skiing require a lot of movement and the 686 Mannual Legacy insulated jacket has an All-Access fit that has enough room to accommodate that.
short_description: Decked out with warm insulation, handy pockets and subtle style, the waterproof 686 Mannual Legacy insulated jacket makes your day on the slopes carefree and loads of fun.
